# Lists Stress Test

This document focuses on ordered and unordered lists, including
nesting and unusual numbering styles.

## Simple ordered list

1. First item
2. Second item
3. Third item

## Simple unordered list

- Alpha
- Bravo
- Charlie

## Nested mixed list

1. Outer one
   - Inner a
   - Inner b
     1. Deep i
     2. Deep ii
2. Outer two
   - Inner c

## Non-standard numbering

a. Item a
b. Item b
c. Item c

## Bullet symbols

* Star bullet one
* Star bullet two
  - Nested dash bullet
